id-73530.title: Joan Thomas – Traveller
id-73530.post-content:
This link in bio for travel influencers template offers you all the tools you need to re-route your followers to all your social networks. Promote your website and your products or include your affiliate links so that your audience can financially support your adventures

This is the perfect Linktree alternative template as it has a very easygoing design you can set up in minutes, while at the same time, it can be expanded in features as your online presence grows.

Key features of the link in bio for travel influencers template

  • Minimal design with an attention-grabbing world map in the background.
  • Fully customizable. Use the colors, fonts, and pictures you want.
  • Mobile-ready. Linking sections adapt to the size of any screen.
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders.
  • Versatile. Expand its features as much as you need.
  • Use it with your own domain.
id-73530.post-excerpt: The link in bio for travel influencers template gives you all the features you need as a content creator.

id-70901.title: Digital Product Store
id-70901.post-content:
The Digital Product Store website template is a contemporary eCommerce design designed to convert using calm colors, simple design and effective typography. It’s a relaxed design with frameless sections and a centralized product area to showcase your wares.

The Digital Product Store template includes highlighted product areas, icon-driven navigation, testimonials, subscription option and attractive supplementary pages. The entire design can be fully customized to suit any products or type of store.

Key features of the Digital Product Store template

  • Contemporary Digital Product website design
  • Calm design with engaging elements designed to convert
  • Lots of product showcase options
  • Can be fully customized for any type of online store
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-70901.post-excerpt: Contemporary digital product store template that engages right away

id-87989.title: Clothing Store
id-87989.post-content:
The Clothing Store template is an achingly stylish eCommerce template designed for modern retail. It opens with a full screen hero image with subtle navigation and cart feature at the top and opens into a smart store page with parallax effect.

The fully customizable template can be made to fit any brand or store type using built-in tools. You can change anything you like in seconds. The template is fully compatible with popular page builders so anyone, with any level of experience can craft something unique!

Key features of the Clothing Store template

  • Stylish modern store design
  • Engaging parallax effect on the homepage
  • Attractive product and checkout pages
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-87989.post-excerpt: The Clothing Store template is a stylish take on eCommerce that’s a joy to use

id-73525.title: Emily Smith – Traveller
id-73525.post-content:
Our link in bio template has all the tools you need to simplify your online presence as a travel influencer. Share your travel adventures, connect your social media profiles, and drive your fans ‌wherever you need to.

A great alternative to Linktree that you can easily set up. With way more design options and advanced features that you can implement as your influence as a traveler grows.

Key features of the link in bio for travel influencers template

  • Clean and vibrant design with a cheerful background.
  • Match your brand by changing the colors, images, or fonts used.
  • Responsive. Everything will look great on small screens.
  • Compatible with Elementor and other page builders.
  • Grow in features as your business expands.
  • Can be used with your own domain name.
id-73525.post-excerpt: The travel influencers template gives you all the features you need to create a great link in bio site.

id-69418.title: Be Bold
id-69418.post-content:
The Be Bold template reflects the quality of many successful stores, well-chosen colors and fonts, confidence-inspiring feel and a genuine elegance that inspires you to purchase.

This is a full width template that uses every inch of screen to help create that image of a lifestyle. Amazing images, attractive product showcases and parallax effects help create the same feeling you get from well-known brand stores. All designed to help you convert.

Key features of the Be Bold template

  • Professional-quality eCommerce template
  • Superb use of colors and fonts
  • Designed to sell using images
  • Awesome layout and design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69418.post-excerpt: Upscale eCommerce template that inspires confidence and encourages you to buy

id-73493.title: Video Editor
id-73493.post-content:
The Video Editor template is a dark responsive portfolio design that can be customized to suit anyone. It’s nicely balanced and contains the essential elements to showcase your skills and your work in creative ways.

The template includes support for video, images and audio and includes video elements on the main page and a portfolio block to tease your latest creations. Pages include an attractive portfolio page, contact form, biography and everything you need to appeal to potential clients.

Key features of the Video Editor template

  • Modern dark portfolio template
  • Supports video, audio and images
  • Well-balanced main and supplementary pages
  • Includes support for galleries, portfolios and biographies
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-73493.post-excerpt: The Video Editor template is everything a videographer needs to attract new clients.

id-60297.title: Day Care Services
id-60297.post-content:
The Day Care Services template is a bright and colorful template that reflects the playfulness of the childcare niche perfectly. It’s a light, bright, energetic design with all the elements a day care service would need from their website.

Pages include an engaging homepage, program and admissions pages, about, contact and an enrolment page. More pages can be added in seconds and configured using a drag and drop page builder. It’s a very flexible theme where you can customize everything you see on the page.

Key features of the Day Care Services template

  • Bright and colorful template that reflects the playfulness of the niche
  • Includes all the essential pages and page elements you need
  • Option to add or remove everything you see on the page
  • Lots of opportunities to use images for engagement
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-60297.post-excerpt: The Day Care Services template is everything a childcare service could need

id-71576.title: Blockchain Technology
id-71576.post-content:
The Blockchain Technology template has been designed for tech companies and has a very modern look and feel that reflects the niche. The template includes all the core page elements and pages you’re likely to need, along with page builder compatibility.

The design is inherently flexible with bold contrasting colors, parallax scrolling and the engagement opportunities any type of tech business could use to drum up business. It’s a very accomplished design with unique appeal!

Key features of the Blockchain Technology template

  • Accomplished design ideal for the tech niche
  • Includes all the core pages a tech business might need
  • Excellent use of color and typography
  • Flexible layouts with page builder compatibility
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-71576.post-excerpt: Blockchain Technology is a stylish design ideal for any kind of tech business

id-73545.title: Kate Stone – Fashion Designer
id-73545.post-content:
The Designer link in bio template provides the same advantages as Linktree but with more design freedom. It’s a fully responsive template with many more opportunities to customize it and make it your own using your favorite page builder.

The Designer link in bio template is a landing page where you can share links to your website, socials, and anywhere you like. They are used extensively to help promote yourself and your skills with a simple, engaging page.

Key features of the Designer link in bio template

  • Attractive Linktree alternative
  • Fully responsive and works on any screen
  • Customize everything you see on the page
  • Share links and resources easily
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-73545.post-excerpt: The Designer link in bio template is the Linktree alternative you’re looking for

id-69858.title: Black Friday Sale
id-69858.post-content:
The Black Friday Sale template makes it so very simple to feature a seasonal sale on your website. It’s a bright, bold and engaging template with the dark design Black Friday is known for with the speed and ease of use Astra is so well known for.

The Black Friday Sale template is a seasonal sale landing page with countdown timer, product showcases, logo area, discount banners and the option to add any page element you need. It’s the easiest way to engage on such a busy shopping day.

Key features of the Black Friday Sale template

  • Modern landing page template for Black Friday
  • Modern and engaging fonts and colors
  • Plenty of product and offer elements throughout
  • Designed to engage and convert
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69858.post-excerpt: Black Friday Sale landing page template designed to boost profits in your store.

id-69690.title: Halloween Party
id-69690.post-content:
The Halloween Party template is a lot of fun. Bold colors, stylish fonts and some amazing graphics create an awesome atmosphere ideal for the holiday. It’s bright, engaging and a lot of fun, which makes it ideal for almost any use.

The page opens with a strong image, header and call to action before opening out into service and product areas. The colors are synonymous with Halloween, the illustrations are great and there’s a real sense of playfulness about the design. It’s perfect for Halloween!

Key features of the Halloween Party template

  • Fun-filled template ideal for Halloween
  • Well-chosen colors, fonts and layout
  • Can be used as a single page, landing page or traditional website
  • Amazing graphics
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69690.post-excerpt: The Halloween Party template is simply amazing. It’s perfect for Halloween!

id-69393.title: T-Shirts Store
id-69393.post-content:
The T-Shirts Store template has a young feel with a pastel color palette, strong imagery and modern fonts. Combined with simple navigation and lots of whitespace, the store is a nice place to spend time, and money.

It’s a full width layout with a strong banner and call to action that opens into a modern page with product areas, featured product sections, reviews and features you would see on any online store. It’s a complete online store template for any modern venture.

Key features of the T-Shirts Store template

  • Modern eCommerce template
  • Slick design with a youthful feel
  • Fully responsive and SEO friendly
  • Lots of options to showcase products
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69393.post-excerpt: The T-Shirts Store template is a young-looking eCommerce design with genuine appeal

id-59604.title: Creative Blog
id-59604.post-content:
The Creative Blog template keeps things simple and light to let your content shine. The design uses subtle colors, lots of white space and a few well-chosen images to showcase yourself or your work.

The design isn’t your usual blog layout, which makes it immediately stand out. The creative way it is designed helps you showcase your work without tying yourself to convention.

Key features of the Creative Blog template

  • Light, friendly design with unconventional layout
  • Still delivers space for blog posts and content
  • Calm colors and fonts help you relax while on the page
  • Includes strong colors for buttons and calls to action
  • Predesigned pages for blog categories
  • Fully compatible with drag and drop page builders
id-59604.post-excerpt: Blog template with a difference that delivers your news and opinion in an engaging way

id-69842.title: Fiona Patisserie
id-69842.post-content:
The Fiona Patisserie template is a light and engaging food template that opens with a large slider with high quality images and a simple menu up top. The page unfolds into a light, engaging design with parallax effect and more imagery.

There are lots of options to add more products, add content, feature banners, special offers and integrate a store into the design. The template also includes an attractive menu page, about us and contact page so you have everything you need.

Key features of the Fiona Patisserie template

  • Light and relaxed WordPress food template
  • Parallax effects and image blocks add character
  • Option to add more content, images or store elements
  • Attractive menu and contact pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69842.post-excerpt: Light hearted WordPress food template designed to help promote and sell
